sourcesContent: import { html, ref, slotted } from "@microsoft/fast-element"; import { Listbox } from "../listbox/listbox.js"; import { endSlotTemplate, startSlotTemplate } from "../patterns/start-end.js"; /** * The template for the {@link @microsoft/fast-foundation#(Combobox:class)} component. * @public */ export const comboboxTemplate = (context, definition) => html ` `;
